These prices are good for as long as you host with us, no contracts, cancel at any time !

We've been in the web hosting business since 1997 under our parent company. We won't oversell our machines. When they get anywhere near full, we add another. We'll move large accounts if we need to do so, but your site(s) will remain up and running. Our server specs are among the best in the business and are located in Wilkes-Barre, PA with direct peering to New York City and Philadelphia USA.

ABOUT PAPAS HOSTING
We have been providing reliable hosting services since 1997 in the US. We provide services to over 3,000 companies here in the US and globally.

LITESPEED WEB SERVER
LiteSpeed is up to 9 times faster than Apache web hosting, processes PHP 50% faster, and 3 times faster than SSL Apache Hosting. LiteSpeed web server fully supports .htaccess, mod_rewrite, and everything else that Apache is well known for - if your site works on an Apache host it will function even faster on our LiteSpeed hosting solutions!

CLOUDLINUX & CAGEFS
CloudLinux is a state of the art software that isolates individual accounts in order to effectively provide the most stable hosting platform of all time. At Papas Hosting we utilize CloudLinux to ensure a stable hosting product. CloudLinux LVE technology controls RAM, CPU and disk resources each customer can use, thus, preventing one customer's website or application from affecting the performance of other websites hosted on the same server.

SERVER MANAGEMENT
Unlike may providers we do not sell our hosting from a resellers account. We manage all of our servers directly and have root access to ensure we can perform all necessary tasks to the server without working with a middle man. This result in lower prices and faster support to each one of our customers.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us

NO ADULT/PORNO/BOTS/IRC/MLM
NO SPAMMING/ABUSE OF SERVER
NO HATRED/SCAM/BOGUS WEBSITES
